text:
Hi,

I use the Apache POI library and I get the Body of the MSG files with the method "getTextBody()", but there is another method "getHtmlBody()". It is possible to get the Body in HTML format? Or it is method deprecated neither?

Thanks,

Warmest Regards
creator: wernernaehle@gmail.com

text: Please ask usage questions on the mailing list - http://poi.apache.org/mailinglists.html - bugzilla is just for bugs
